problem.markdown:
>>In mixing models, a batch size of one is ideal, only if the machines and the people in this factory can accomodate switching among different models. << ( X ) True. ( ) False.
[explanation] In general, smaller batches lead to less inventory, but a lower production rate for the same setup time and operation time. So a batch size of one is ideal when setup time and operation time are minimum. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: In mixing models, a batch size of one is ideal, only if the machines and the people in this factory can accomodate switching among different models.
